pkgmetadata.longdescription: Daily Based Morgan-Morgan-Finney (DMMF) Soil Erosion Model // Implements the daily based Morgan-Morgan-Finney (DMMF) soil erosion model (Choi et al., 2017 doi:10.3390/w9040278) for estimating surface runoff and sediment budgets from a field or a catchment on a daily basis.
